member.summary: ID of the task or event. It is a unique code..

member.summary: Record Type..

member.summary: Description for property 'RecordType'. Description associated with the code..

member.summary: Enumeration for property 'RecordType'. Record Type.
member.remarks: This property use a enumeration based on property 'RecordType'

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.OriginType
member.summary: Type of program or person that originated the event or task..

member.name: F:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.OriginTypeDescript
member.summary: Description for property 'OriginType'. Description associated with the code..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.OriginTypeEnum
member.summary: Enumeration for property 'OriginType'. Type of program or person that originated the event or task.
member.remarks: This property use a enumeration based on property 'OriginType'

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.OriginatedBy
member.summary: ID of who originated the task or event. For example, if the task was originated by a business rule, this field will contain the ID of the business rule..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.Starts
member.summary: Date and time when the event will start. For example, if the event is a meeting, this field will contain the date and time when it starts..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.Ends
member.summary: Date and time when the event will end. For example, if the event is a meeting, this field will contain the date and time when it ends..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.Priority
member.summary: Priority..

member.name: F:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.PriorityDescript
member.summary: Description for property 'Priority'. Description associated with the code..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.PriorityEnum
member.summary: Enumeration for property 'Priority'. Priority.
member.remarks: This property use a enumeration based on property 'Priority'

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.AllDay
member.summary: Indicates that the activity will take the full day. When selected, the starting and ending time are not needed..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.IndividualTask
member.summary: Indicates that the task or activity is to be done by one person only. It is useful for tasks or activities assigned to a group of users. In that case, if it is selected, it means that the first user of the group that takes the activity will be able to mark it completed. If it is not selected, each member of the group will have to do it..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.PercentageCompleted
member.summary: Percentage that has been completed of the activity or task. It is useful to follow up complex activities..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.ShortDescription
member.summary: Short description of the activity. It is the text shown when the user inquiries the agenda or todo list..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.LongDescription
member.summary: Detailed description of the activity. It is used only if the short description is not enough..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.VisualTIMETransaction
member.summary: Code of the VisualTIME transaction that allows to perform the activity using the system..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.CompletedAction
member.summary: Action to take when the task is to be done..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.CompletedActionEnum
member.summary: Enumeration for property 'CompletedAction'. Action to take when the task is to be done.
member.remarks: This property use a enumeration based on property 'CompletedAction'

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.AlarmActive
member.summary: Indicates that there is an alarm set for this activity or task..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.AlarmDateAndTime
member.summary: Date and time when the alarm is scheduled for this activity or task..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.ReminderInfo
member.summary: Reminder Info..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.RecurrenceActive
member.summary: Indicates that this activity or task is recurrence. (RepeatActive).

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.RepeatFrequency
member.summary: For repetitive events, this is the frequency of repeat..

member.name: F:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.RepeatFrequencyDescript
member.summary: Description for property 'RepeatFrequency'. Description associated with the code..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.RepeatFrequencyEnum

member.remarks: This property use a enumeration based on property 'RepeatFrequency'

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.RepeatStarts
member.summary: For repetitive events, this is the starting date of repeat..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.RepeatEnds
member.summary: For repetitive events, this is the ending date of repeat..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.RepeatTimes
member.summary: For repetitive events, this is the number of times that the event will repeat..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.RecurrenceInfo
member.summary: Recurrence Info..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.WarningWhenCompleted
member.summary: To send a message to the user when the task changes to completed state..

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.IsNew
member.summary: Gets or sets the object state is loaded from the database or not.
member.value: true if the object is loaded from database; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.IsDirty
member.summary: Gets or sets if the object state is modified or not.
member.value: true if the object is modified; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets if the object state is pending for delete or not.
member.value: true if the object is delete masked; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.TaskElements
member.summary: This table is an important complement for the table of tasks and events, because it associates the task or event to a document that is stored in the VisualTIME DB, like a policy, claim, application, etc.

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.TaskHistories
member.summary: This table maintains history information about an activity or event. Its only purpose is to support undo actions after any modification.

member.name: P:InMotionGIT.Agenda.Activities.Design.TaskConfiguration.TaskOwners
member.summary: Table of tasks owners. Task owners can be either specific users or groups of users.
